block.p: Steve Hardwick joined Grey Worldwide, part of the Grey Global Group unit of the WPP Group, as president of the New York office, a post that was long vacant. He had been president of the New York office of StrawberryFrog since last September.

Tammy Greenberg joined the Radio Advertising Bureau, New York, as senior vice president for marketing, a post being created as the bureau intensifies efforts to encourage advertisers to buy radio commercial time. Ms. Greenberg had been vice president for client partnerships at the Time Warner Global Media Group, New York, part of Time Warner, where she worked with Jeffrey M. Haley, now the president and chief executive of the bureau.
